title: Man arrested after 'having sex with stuffed Olaf and unicorn in supermarket'
text:

A man was arrested after he was seen having sex with a giant stuffed Olaf and a stuffed unicorn in a supermarket.

Cody Christopher Meader is said to have sexually assaulted a pair of “large stuffed animal toys” inside a Target store in Florida.

Police said they arrested the 20-year-old on a criminal mischief charge, reports The Smoking Gun.

As detailed in a criminal complaint Meader entered the retailer around 2pm on Tuesday and approached a display of merchandise featuring characters from the Disney film Frozen.

It is claimed by police that he then selected a “large Olaf stuffed toy” and proceeded to place it on the floor of the Target.

He then began to 'dry hump' the cinematic snowman, according to a police report.

(Image: Daily Record)

It is alleged he then returned the tainted Olaf to the display before entering the toy department, where he “selected a large unicorn stuffed animal and began to ‘dry hump’ this item.”

After consorting with the stuffed animals, Meader, who lives in St. Petersburg, was detained while still inside the store.

They said after being read his rights, Meader reportedly “admitted to doing ‘stupid stuff’."

Police say the stuffed items were “removed from the store floor” and destroyed.

According to the complaint, Meader’s father told police that “def has a history of this type of behaviour” but it appears he has no criminal history.

He was charged with criminal mischief and booked into the county jail on the misdemeanour count.

After later posting a $150 bond, he was released from custody.
description: Cody Christopher Meader, 20,  is said to have sexually assaulted a pair of “large stuffed animal toys” inside a Target store in Florida
